author: Marilyn Monroe
text: “I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.”

author: Charles Dickens
text: “Ask no questions, and you'll be told no lies.”

author: George Orwell
text: “If liberty means anything at all it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.”
